sentences.en: ...some of the parameters that determine the taste of a wine.
sentences.cn: …一些决定葡萄酒味道的参数。

sentences.en: It is the parameter of distribution.
Permeability is an important parameter for a oil reservoir characterization and engineering.
sentences.cn: 渗透率是油藏描述和油藏工程中一关键性的参数.

sentences.en: Rock strength is a basic parameter for rock engineering design.
sentences.cn: 岩石强度是岩体工程设计的基本依据.

sentences.en: Several methods of curve - fitting data yield consistent estimates of parameter values.
sentences.cn: 几种曲线似合数据的方法均能得到参数值的一致性估计.

sentences.en: Static and dynamic displacement is another method of categorizing this parameter.
sentences.cn: 静态和动态位移是这个参数的另一种分类方法.

sentences.en: The distance between orifice groups is another parameter associated with stability.
sentences.cn: 喷孔组合之间的距离是与不稳定性有关的另一参数.

sentences.en: The inquiry has to stay within the parameters laid down by Congress.
sentences.cn: 调查必须局限于国会设定的范围之内。

sentences.en: The specifications may sometimes appear within the parameter list itself.
sentences.cn: 区分部分有时可以在参数表本身出现.

sentences.en: The third parameter needed for an oil field to occur is the cap rock or seal.
sentences.cn: 形成油田所必须的第三个参数是盖层岩石或封闭层.

sentences.en: The variational parameter multiplying each coordinate is called a scale factor.
sentences.cn: 每个坐标所乘的变分参数叫定标因子.

sentences.en: This empirical single - parameter model was selected for interim use because it is simple and unambiguous.
sentences.cn: 这一单一参数经验模型,由于其简单明了而选作临时应用.

sentences.en: This is a configurable parameter used for locating the digital CTI display.
sentences.cn: 这是可配置的参数被用来设置数字控制终端接口的显示.

sentences.en: Three hundred acres of land is the parameter of our university, s expansion ( growth ).
sentences.cn: (三百英亩的土地是本大学发展的限度 ) ( 如果用limit取代parameter, 会更简略易懂.

sentences.en: V $ PARAMETER displays information about the initialization parameters that are currently in effect for the session.
sentences.cn: v$parameter动态性能视图显示了对当前会话起作用的初始化参数信息.

sentences.en: We call parameter 4 is a dynamic parameter.
We cannot accept or reject a hypothesis about a population parameter simply by intuition.
sentences.cn: 我们不能只凭感觉简单地决定接受或拒绝总体参数的某种假设.

words.tran_cn: [数][物] 参数的；[数][物] 参量的

phrases.tran_cn: 焊接参数；焊接工艺参数

trans.tran_cn: [数]参数，<物><数>参量，限制因素，决定因素
trans.tran_en: Parameters are factors or limits that affect the way something can be done or made
